summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the laying off, opening, widening and establishing of South Mount Baker Boulevard between Rainier Avenue South and Empire Way South; Empire Way South at South Mount Baker Boulevard and Rainier Avenue South at South Mount Baker Boulevard; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; providing for the acquisition of the right to construct slopes for cuts and fills on certain abutting property and providing for payment therefor.
